item.title: How To: Deploy local D365F&O environment from VHD
item.description: Deploying a local development environment is kind of routine task for an F&O developer. Below are the steps I always follow to get my environment up and ready to work. Download VHD. Usualy I download VHD files from LCS shared asset library - Shared asset library. There is “Downloadable VHD” tab from where I can download VM image. You can use your browser download manager or a third-party one. I prefer to use PS script and azcopy.
